title: Collaborative Learning Group Formation Design and Language Simulation Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate language proficiency and foundational experience in collaborative learning
context.additional_context: A VR simulation-based collaborative learning environment for in-service professionals to develop group formation and operational competencies for language proficiency enhancement.

learning_goals: Learners design optimal combinations considering knowledge levels and linguistic competencies when forming collaborative learning groups.
Learners apply role division and communication strategies in VR-based simulation environments to advance task-solving processes.
Learners improve collaborative learning efficiency by 20%+ using formative assessment tools that analyze interactions among group members.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
